<|python_start|>import pandas as pd

# Given transactions data
data = [
    {"amount": 100.0, "date": '2022-01-01', "subject": "Pizza party"},
    {"amount": 200.0, "date": '2022-02-12', "subject": "New year gift"},
    {"amount": 50.0, "date": '2022-03-01', "subject": "Spotify Premium"},
    {"amount": 1000.0, "date": '2022-03-04', "subject": "Purchase at Apple Store: iPhone 3GS"},
    {"amount": 10.0, "date": '2022-03-07', "subject": ""},
]

# Create DataFrame
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Categorize transactions (simple example based on subject)
df['category'] = df['subject'].apply(lambda x: x.split(':')[0].strip() if ':' in x else x)

# Group by category and sum amounts
summary = df.groupby('category')['amount'].sum().reset_index()

print(summary)<|python_end|><|eom|>assistant
